content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Lab at position (1, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (status=EntityStatus.NO_POWER, research=automation)

### Furnace at position (4, -63)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (fuel=Inventory({'coal': 25}), direction=Direction.UP, status=EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS)

### Electric pole at position (1, -1)
- No electric pole was successfully placed due to obstruction.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure the target location is clear of other entities before attempting to place an electric pole. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
